amendment.description: To provide trade promotion authority for the Trans-Pacific Partnership Agreement and for other trade agreements.

action.text: Amendment SA 626 as modified, under the order of 9/20/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 55. Record Vote Number: 141.

Amendment SA 626 proposed by Senator McConnell to Amendment SA 633. (consideration: CR S5739-5745, S5752-5759, S5763-5764; text: CR S5740) To provide trade promotion authority for the Trans-Pacific Partnership Agreement and for other trade agreements.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 626 as modified, under the order of 9/20/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 55. Record Vote Number: 141.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 626 as modified, under the order of 9/20/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 55. Record Vote Number: 141.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 626 proposed by Senator McConnell to Amendment SA 633.
